name: Ghosts (AbexGames)
description:
You have to try it out . Creepy ghosts are coming up.

You need to get to your home but the way is going to be really tough.

Enemies and obstacles are on your path home but i'm certain you are going to make it out and reach the box.

Wish you well on your journey.

PC Controls :

Moving  - Arrows (left, right, A, D)

Jump - Space

Attack - Left Ctrl
